Class CuboidBarrierTrigger

kin.env.trigger.EnvironmentTrigger
kin.env.trigger.BarrierTrigger
kin.env.trigger.CuboidBarrierTrigger
public class CuboidBarrierTrigger
extends BarrierTrigger
Definitions of triggers that occur when a cuboid goes beyond a barrier line from left to right.
